name: Growth Nectar
desc: Grants 4% increase to ALL stats for each buff, up to a maximum of 4 (+4 per stack) .
notes:
Growth Nectar is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
The holder of this item gains a 4% increase to all stats for every unique buff that is currently active, up to 4 buffs (+4 per stack). 
All the stat increases are multiplicative, after all other item stats have been added, which may be worse for some stats and better for others.
The 'all stats' of this item does not include acceleration.


== Valid Buffs ==


=== Survivor Buffs ===
Some survivors have innate buffs that count toward this item:

  Bandit:
  Smoke Bomb counts as 2 (invisibility and speed).
  Desperado stacks count as 1.
  MUL-T:
  Transport Mode is 1.
  Power Mode is 1.
Transport Mode and Power Mode cannot be used together, but one is often active.
  Mercenary:
  Eviscerate immunity grants 1.
  Void Fiend:
Corrupted state permanently grants 1.
During transformations, 1 is briefly activated for immunity. This means that when corrupting, 2 are briefly active.
  Seeker:
Tranquility stacks (grey petal) grant 1.
Saving Grace (gold petal) grants 1. Saving Grace can also be sent to other players, and is lost on death.
  CHEF:
  Roll briefly grants 1.
  Yes, CHEF! grants 1 when queued up.
  False Son:
  Step of the Brothers briefly applies 1.
  Meridian's Will applies 1 while   Energized Core is active.

== Notes ==
Clarification: This item increases max health, movement speed, damage, attack speed, crit, regen, and armor.
Unlike other movement speed increases, acceleration is not increased here, potentially leading to feeling "slippery".
Multiplicative crit chance is far less beneficial than linear.
Multiplicative armor is not beneficial if you do not any armor granting items or are playing a survivor with base armor.
Unlike  Irradiant Pearl, it does affect all armor, not just base armor.
The   Growth Nectar Buff does not count towards the 4 (+4 per stack) buffs.
This does not mean it counts as a debuff; whether or not a buff counts is manually set by the developers.
The stat boosts given by this item are multiplicative, similiar to  Spinel Tonic.
Individual stacks of   Growth Nectar Buff are immediately added/removed as other unique buffs are added/removed.
The following items do not count as a buff:
 Cautious Slug
 Rose Buckler
 Frost Relic
 Genesis Loop

== Trivia ==
Prior to version 1.3.6, this item's simplified description was "Survivors with 5 or more buffs are marked for greatness.", a reference to the description for the  Death Mark.
